Shi(?)shi(meaning unknown)
Kiyo, some, Isa, Fusa, Chiro, Tsune, Kie, Kise, Kaku, Tora, Yoshi, ?ma, To?, Kin, Iku, Mume, Sei, Man, these are all women\'s name, therefore, probably the names of the other courtesans belong to the same house
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Scene from a Skit with Popular Courtesans
title: Three Prostitutes of Wakafune-ya House: Shiratsuyu, Isono and Isoji
